com.atlantbh.utils.location
Class LocationTracker

java.lang.Object
  com.atlantbh.utils.location.LocationTracker

public class LocationTracker
extends java.lang.Object

A utility class used for easz location tracking and management.

Stops location tracking for a given listener.

Parameters:
locationManager - A LocationManager instance.
listener - The LocationListener that the tracking should be stopped for.

stopLocationTracking

public void stopLocationTracking(LocationManager locationManager)
Stops location tracking for the last listener that tracking has been started for The usage of this method is discouraged.

Parameters:
locationManager - A LocationManager instance.

isBetterLocation

public boolean isBetterLocation(Location location,
                                Location currentBestLocation)
Compare two locations.

Parameters:
location - The new location.
currentBestLocation - The most accurate location the tracker currently holds.
Returns:
true if the new location is better than the current best, false otherwise.

Check whether the current best location is older than five minutes.

Returns:
true if the location is older than five minutes, false otherwise.
